name: Across-Stitch (itch)
description:
Deductive logic puzzles with a colorful twist!

Enjoy 8 different cross-stitch variants that will keep you thinking in different ways. With a weave and some colorful thread, can you complete a pattern with only clues of which colors go in each row and column?

Uh-oh!

Later on, stubborn thread will be thrown in that can only be stitched in certain spots!

Features
  • 4 game modes with different difficulties, fabric sizes, and threads
  • 4 additional game modes that put a twist to the stitching mechanics
  • Achievements
  • Cross-stitch generator that works with uploaded JPG or PNG images
  • Download cross-stitches and share via code
